programme.title: Deadlock

programme.title: Shooter
programme.desc: Reluctantly pressed into service again, a former military sniper (Mark Wahlberg) plots revenge against his powerful foes after being betrayed and wounded.

programme.title: K-19: The Widowmaker
programme.desc: The commander (Harrison Ford) of a Russian submarine tries to avert a disaster after a nuclear reactor malfunctions.

programme.title: Bad Moms
programme.desc: Pushed beyond their limits, three overworked and stressed-out mothers (Mila Kunis, Kristen Bell, Kathryn Hahn) go wild after ditching their daily routines.

programme.title: Daddy's Home 2
programme.desc: Father and stepfather Dusty and Brad join forces to make Christmastime perfect for the children. Their newfound partnership soon gets put to the test when Dusty's old-school, macho dad and Brad's gentle father arrive to turn the holiday upside down.

programme.title: Shooter
programme.desc: Reluctantly pressed into service again, a former military sniper (Mark Wahlberg) plots revenge against his powerful foes after being betrayed and wounded.

programme.title: I Hope They Serve Beer in Hell
programme.desc: A selfish cad (Matt Czuchry) jeopardizes his relationship with two close friends after throwing one of them a particularly decadent bachelor party.

programme.title: The Doors
programme.desc: UCLA film student Jim Morrison (Val Kilmer) finds a girlfriend (Meg Ryan), forms a band and turns tragic 1960s rock star.

programme.title: Mourning in Lod

programme.title: Hands Up
programme.desc: After his cousin is shot and killed by a white police officer in Chicago, and Black Lives Matter protests spread across the city, a Black teen desperately fights for a way out of the most notorious murder capital in America.

programme.title: All the Wrong Ingredients
programme.desc: Desperate to win a high-stakes dessert contest, chef Ben unintentionally cooks up an imaginary friend to help him reinvent the meaning of delicious. But what happens when his ambition becomes a monster.

programme.title: Attica
programme.desc: During the summer of 1971, tensions between inmates and guards at the Attica Correctional Facility are at an all-time high. On the morning of Sept. 9, it all comes to a head as Attica becomes the stage for one of the largest U.S. prison riots ever.

programme.title: Ella Enchanted

programme.title: Adore

programme.desc: The friends welcome a new baby to the family, explore different musical instruments, eat in a restaurant and experience the change of seasons.

programme.title: Steel Magnolias

programme.title: From the Earth to the Moon

programme.title: From the Earth to the Moon

programme.title: From the Earth to the Moon

programme.title: From the Earth to the Moon

programme.desc: The Caped Crusader (Michael Keaton) saves dismal Gotham City and gorgeous Vicki Vale (Kim Basinger) from the freaky Joker (Jack Nicholson).

programme.desc: Ersatz kryptonite laced with tobacco tar splits Superman (Christopher Reeve) in two: good Clark Kent and bad Man of Steel.
